Hi,
           Is there a way to selectively discard pages while archiving?=

i.e use a page to get links from it to crawl further but don't store
that =
page. (in other words crawl that page to get outgoing links from
it which m=
ight lead to pages of interest but dont store the parent page)
           D=
oes heritrix allow this? Otherwise I guess I would post
filter the crawled =
pages. 

Jonathan
